  • Class Description
    CombinaisonManuelle
    This Class is one of the 3 basic classes which deal with the combinaisons issues.
    Combinaisons
    This Class is one of the 3 basic classes which deal with the combinaisons issues.
    CombinaisonsAuto
    This Class is one of the 3 basic classes which deal with the combinaisons issues.
    CombinaisonsParams  
    Jeu  
    JeuChallenger
    Twin Class of the class JeuDefenseur This class defines the characteristics of one of the 3 patterns : In the Challenger pattern, the Player has to find out the combinaison created by the Machine, This Class enables to run as many loops as the number of rounds and to return the value of victoireJoueur The variable victoireJoueur says if the Human Player has won that is if he had found out the combinaison automatically defined by the Machine This class instances objects and methods of some Classes : * JeuBegin about the game characteristics, * PlayerMachine about its method used by the Machine to automatically compare both automatic and manual combinaisons, * Combinaisons, CombinaisonsAuto and CombinaisonManuelle about the size of the combinaisons and the methods to combine automatically and not * This class objects are instanced only in class JeuDuel.
    JeuDefenseur
    Twin class of the Class JeuChallenger This class defines the characteristics of one of the 3 patterns : In the Defenseur pattern : the Machine has to find out the combinaison created by the Player, This Class enables to run as many loops as the number of rounds and to return the value of victoireJoueurDef The variable victoireJoueurDef says if the Human Player has won that is if the Player Machine has not been able to find out the combinaison defined by the HuÃ¹an Player This class instances objects and methods of some Classes : JeuBegin about the game characteristics, PlayerJoueur about its method to handly compare both automatic and manual combinaisons, Combinaisons, CombinaisonsAuto and CombinaisonManuelle about the size of the combinaisons and the methods to combine automatically and not This class objects are instanced only in class JeuDuel.
    JeuDuel
    This class run alternatively methods of twin-classes JeuChallenger and Jeudefenseur.
